question: 保持する
sourceAnswer: To Keep, To Hold, To Maintain, To Retain
activeAnswer: To Keep, To Hold, To Maintain, To Retain
sourceMnemonic:
This is the verb version of <ja>保持</ja> (keep), so this means <vocabulary>to keep</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>to hold</vocabulary>, or <vocabulary>to maintain</vocabulary>.

Note that this is a formal word that's commonly used in professional or official contexts.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is the same as <ja>保持</ja>, so if you know that word's reading, you know this one too.
